name: Mouse on the Moon
description:
Jerry must make it to the moon in order to rescue his new girlfriend Isabelle, (a beautiful butterfly) from his terrifying ex-girlfriend Harriet, (a sly and cunning spider) who has kidnapped her, before it is too late! He must use his trusty jetpack. The only problem is that it has "ONLY ONE USE". Once you run out of fuel you will plument to your death and be forced to start again. Upgrade your jetpack to unlock cool new abilities and reach new heights! 

Tutorial:

A = LEFT

D = RIGHT

SPACE = FLY

\\=====================================================//

For free gold if you are struggling:

PASSWORD:   "happydays" (single use) or "forever" (permanent unlock)  

(All lower case)

//=====================================================\\
